targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT sum(bytes) as size
FROM system.parts
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT sum(bytes) as size
FROM system.parts

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS delta,
  current.nos_name,
  current.status,
  current.validator_pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = ${slot_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY delta ASC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS delta,
  current.nos_name,
  current.status,
  current.validator_pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = 2640927
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = (2640927 - 32 * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY delta ASC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Lido Sync Committee validators participation (last finalized epoch)
Blockchain Sync Committee validators participation (last finalized epoch)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_sync
    WHERE epoch_participation_percent < (${chain_sync_participation_var} - ${sync_participation_distance_var}) AND 
    (last_slot_of_epoch <= ${slot_number_var} AND last_slot_of_epoch > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6))
    ORDER BY last_slot_of_epoch DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_sync
    WHERE epoch_participation_percent < (98.69 - 10) AND 
    (last_slot_of_epoch <= 3468511 AND last_slot_of_epoch > (3468511 - 32 * 6))
    ORDER BY last_slot_of_epoch DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey

panels.title: Number of times the validator sync participation less chain average (last 6 finalized epochs)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = ${slot_number_var} AND epoch_participation_percent < (${chain_sync_participation_var} - ${sync_participation_distance_var})
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = 3468511 AND epoch_participation_percent < (98.69 - 10)
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent

panels.title: Validators Sync Committee participation less chain average (last finalized epoch)
Number of validators with sync participation less average (last finalized epoch)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6))
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= 2640927 AND slot_to_attestation > (2640927 - 32 * 6))
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of times the validator miss attestation (last 6 finalized epochs)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_attestations
WHERE attested = 0 AND (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation >= (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var}))
ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_attestations
WHERE attested = 0 AND (slot_to_attestation <= 2640927 AND slot_to_attestation >= (2640927 - 32))
ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE proposed = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6))
    ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  validator_pubkey,
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE proposed = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_propose <= 2640927 AND slot_to_propose > (2640927 - 32 * 6))
    ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Validators with missed proposes (last finalized epoch)
Number of validators with missed propose (last finalized epoch)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    nos_id,
    nos_name,
    status,
    validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_balances
WHERE (status == 'active_slashed' OR status == 'exited_slashed' OR validator_slashed == 1) AND nos_name != '' and slot = ${slot_number_var}
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    nos_id,
    nos_name,
    status,
    validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_balances
WHERE (status == 'active_slashed' OR status == 'exited_slashed' OR validator_slashed == 1) AND nos_name != '' and slot = 2431231
LIMIT 100
